name: Time Switch (itch)
description:
Time-manipulation based, Portal-esque puzzle game I have been working on. Still bugs to squish so feel free to comment them. 

Notes: 
- At the moment it will feel very Portal-esque, especially due to the voice. This all actually happened by accident on basing it off two or three completely separate ideas. Future version have more of a 'Zapp Brannigan style' voice-over.
- Let me know your thoughts, bugs, critiques, etc. But be nice...I'm kidding, this is the internet, you be you boo boo. 

- Controls are in the 'Story Mode' but for the lazy/motivated:
 WASD = move, Spacebar = Jump, MiddleMouseButton/E = pick up object, F = throw picked up object if possible, RightClick = aim time particles, LeftClick = activate time particles / switch, C = freeze time, Hold R = reverse time, ScrollWheel = change time manipulation speed, LeftShift = speed up/slow down time, RightCTRL/RightALT = change background music, 0 = restart level, K = enter/exit ghost mode (ghost mode allows you to fly through walls and outside the level - only exists in alpha due to potential unforeseeable bugs.)

Current BugLog:
 - Levels needs to be more streamlined and some levels need to be combined as they don't deserve to be entirely separate levels. 
- Level select actually only goes up to level 25. If you select further than that, it will return you to the main menu/take you to your previous level. I do know this, and it is an easy fix. One day I will fix it. 
- Beginning of story feels way too much like a tutorial and could be done a lot better. 

- Currently a side-project, not main focus.
